properties.media:imagetext:
ALOHA
Over the past year I have been creating
menus for United Airlines that bring an
exciting touch of Hawai'i to onboard
dining. From my earliest memories of my
father's luaus and my mother's old-
fashioned pot roasts to the founding of
my highly acclaimed restaurants, my
love of comforting foods and warm
hospitality have been the most
important things in my life. I am
delighted to present United customers
with the bounty of the islands - its
fresh fish, exotic vegetables and
succulent tropical fruits.
Working closely with United's
Corporate Executive Chefs, we created
an appetizing menu of delicious
tropical cuisine. Some of the selections
are favorites at my restaurants; others
were created especially for you.
I always like to say the sky's the limit.
I am thrilled to reach it with you!
Welcome to United's Service with
Aloha" where some of the finest things
on earth take flight: friendly service
and a chance to unwind and experience
flavors reminiscent of the most
beautiful islands in the world.
Mahalo nui loa!
Sam Choy
Master Chef/Author
Sam Choy's Diamond
Head Restaurant
Honolulu, Hawaii
Sam Choy's Breakfast,
Lunch & Crab
Honolulu, Hawaii
Sam Choy's Kahului
Restaurant
Kahului, Hawaii
Sam Choy's Lahaina
Restaurant
Lahaina, Hawaii
Sam Choy's Hawai'i at
Keauhou
Kailua-Kona, Hawaii
Sam Choy's Hawai'i at
Pleasure Island
Tumon, Guam
Sam Choy's Kaloko
Kailua-Kona, Hawaii
Sam Choy's Tokyo
Tokyo, Japan
TO BEGIN
Sam's signature salad
Seasonal greens with julienned carrots, daikon and beets,
accompanied by Sam Choy's award-winning creamy Oriental dressing
or Hana Maui papaya vinaigrette
MAIN COURSE
Honomalino lamb chops
Lamb chops grilled to perfection
served with pineapple papaya marmalade,
alfredo sauce and fusilli pasta garnished with vegetables
Island roasted chicken breast prepared with a natural jus
Presented with carrots sautéed with ginger and brown sugar
and basmati rice mixed with a ginger pesto blend
Coriander-crusted ahi with ginger cream sauce
Fresh ahi sautéed with a toasted peppercorn,
sesame seed and coriander crust,
complemented by Ulupalakua corn smashed potatoes
and Kona roasted vegetables featuring diced zucchini,
squash, celery and bell peppers
DESSERT
Ice cream sundae
BEN&JERRY'S. Vanilla and Coffee ice cream
accompanied by hot fudge sauce, wafer and whipped cream
STARBUCKS. coffee will be available throughout the flight
Crystal Geyser Natural Alpine Spring Water
PRIOR TO ARRIVAL
cookies warm from the oven
2003. 106.009
